Question: Through which examples have the gopis allowed Uddhava to scold?
Option 1: She was living waiting for the arrival of Krishna but Krishna himself did not come and sent the message of yoga. Due to this their anguish has increased even more.
Option 2: She was trying to plead for protection from Krishna seeking a message of love from there. But seeing the stream of yoga-message coming from there his heart was broken.
Option 3: She was trying to plead for protection from Krishna seeking a message of love from there. But seeing the stream of yoga-message coming from there his heart was broken.
Option 4: She expected Krishna to keep the dignity of her love. They will avenge their love with love. But he broke the limits of love by sending yoga-messages.
